article: What separates people who reach their goals from everyone else is their ability to stay on track, despite challenges. _ will come; you can bet there will be chances for you to get off track. If you're an athlete, it may be an injury that causes you to have to _ practices. If you're trying to get to a healthy weight, you may have to travel _ and stay with a friend who doesn't like to work out . The point is that some kind of challenge will _ .   How we deal with these challenges _ the victims from the victors. You can use challenges as a stepping _ or as a block, and you can use them to _ your ambition or block your view; the _ is yours.   Challenges should _ to make you stronger and more consistent as you attend to each difficulty. They should cause your _ to dig deeper, in search of a (an) _ .   The problem arises when you don't _ challenges. If you can predict potential problems and plan _ , you will have confidence and your belief in yourself will _ up.  Your ability to stay _ and overcome difficulties is what will set you apart and allow you to achieve your goal.   Start working toward your dreams daily. Get started by setting _ what your next step is to accomplish your goal. Then get into _ as you move closer to your goal daily.
